title: Rainbolt (a moderator telegram bot)
description: I made this bot to be a 'fun sponge', it moderates the group and deletes any curse words. it has other regular bot features tho.

title: Ripple
description: A deepsearching tool for Android built for the Termux linux enviroment. In essence, it allows you to scan through every file on your device.

title: StashDB
description: A python package that allows you to use a json file as a database (no longer being maintained, i lost access to my previous pypi account).

title: Herald
description: A webapp that allows you to send web requests, a minified and lightweight alternative to postman.
